Package jumpingalien.model

Class Slime

  • java.lang.Object
    • jumpingalien.model.Organism
      • jumpingalien.model.Beast
        • jumpingalien.model.Slime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Imovement
    public class Slime
extends Beast
    A class of slimes as a special kind of beast. Slime blobs are pretty dumb predatory land beasts aiming to devour Mazub. They possess all properties of Mazub except for the abilities to duck, to jump and to consume Plants. (Copied from assignment 3)

        @Raw
public Slime​(long id,
             int x,
             int y,
             School<Slime> school,
             jumpingalien.util.Sprite... sprites)
        Initialize this new slime with an x coordinate of its lower left pixel, an y coordinate of its lower left pixel and a list of sprites.
        Parameters:
        pixelLeftX - The x-coordinate of the lower left pixel of the slime.
        pixelBottomY - The y-coordinate of the lower left pixel of the slime.
        sprites - A list of sprites representing the appearance of slime.
